page.title: 02Housing
page.content: THE MAJORITY OF HOUSES IN THIS AREA ARE CONCENTRATED IN NEW RADNOR. MOST ARE OWNED PRIVATELY AND DATE BACK 100 YEARS OR MORE. THE OLDEST HOUSE STANDING AT PRESENT WAS BUILT IN 1500 AS A PARSONAGE. SEVERAL BUNGALOWS OF MODERN DESIGN HAVE BEEN BUILT RECENTLY IN CLAWDD LANE. A SMALL COUNCIL ESTATE OF 14 SEMI_DETACHED HOUSES STAND IN LEWIS CLOSE IMMEDIATELY BEHIND THE SCHOOL CAMPUS. THE OLDER HOUSES WERE BUILT FROM STONE QUARRIED LOCALLY AT NIBLETT'S QUARRY, HARLEY VALLEY. THE MORE RECENT BUILDINGS ARE CONSTRUCTED WITH RED BRICK OR RENDERED CONCRETE BLOCKS. SEVERAL FARMS ARE TO BE FOUND SCATTERED AMONGST THE RADNOR HILLS.
